title: Chilli con carne with red peppers recipe
directions: Dry-fry the minced beef and onions in a large pan until browned. Add the chilli powder and cook for 1 minute. Drain the kidney beans and add along with tomatoes and red peppers.
Dissolve the stock cube in 300ml (Â½pt) boiling water and add to the chilli mixture. Bring to the boil and simmer for 20 minutes. Season with pepper and sugar to taste. Serve with fluffy white rice.
ingredients: 2 Everyday Value onions, peeled and chopped
2 Everyday Value red peppers, deseeded and diced
